title: Temporary export licence for cultural goods

details.description: You need an export licence to loan cultural goods over a certain age or value from a museum or gallery to an exhibition abroad or to take cultural goods abroad temporarily for sale or private enjoyment
details.licence_short_description: Export licence to loan cultural goods over a certain age or value from a museum or gallery to an exhibition abroad or to take cultural goods abroad temporarily.
details.licence_overview: To loan works of art or other cultural goods over a certain age and value from a museum or art gallery to an exhibition abroad or to take cultural goods abroad temporarily for sale or private enjoyment, you may need a temporary export licence from the Export Licensing Unit of the Arts Council.
